hiv.info: HIV (Human Immunodeficiency Virus) weakens the immune system. Causes: spread through unprotected sex, blood, or mother-to-child. Prevention: safe sex, clean needles, screening. Remedies: Antiretroviral therapy (ART).

malaria.info: Malaria is caused by Plasmodium parasites spread by Anopheles mosquitoes. Prevention: mosquito nets, repellents, eliminating stagnant water. Remedies: antimalarial drugs like chloroquine, ACTs.

tuberculosis.info: Tuberculosis (TB) is caused by Mycobacterium tuberculosis. Spread: air when patients cough/sneeze. Prevention: BCG vaccine, early treatment. Remedies: long-course antibiotics (6 months).

diabetes.info: Diabetes is a chronic condition where blood sugar is too high. Causes: genetics, poor diet, obesity. Prevention: healthy diet, exercise, weight control. Remedies: insulin, oral medicines, lifestyle change.

hypertension.info: Hypertension (high blood pressure) increases risk of heart disease. Causes: stress, salt, obesity. Prevention: low-salt diet, exercise, avoid smoking. Remedies: antihypertensive medicines, lifestyle change.

covid-19.info: COVID-19 is caused by coronavirus SARS-CoV-2. Spread: respiratory droplets. Prevention: masks, distancing, vaccination. Remedies: supportive care, antivirals, oxygen for severe cases.

cholera.info: Cholera is a diarrheal disease from Vibrio cholerae via contaminated water/food. Prevention: safe water, sanitation, vaccine. Remedies: oral rehydration salts, IV fluids, antibiotics.

asthma.info: Asthma is a chronic airway disease. Causes: allergies, pollution, exercise. Prevention: avoid triggers. Remedies: inhalers (bronchodilators, steroids).

cancer.info: Cancer is uncontrolled cell growth. Causes: genetics, smoking, alcohol, infections. Prevention: healthy lifestyle, screenings, vaccines (HPV, HBV). Remedies: surgery, chemo, radiation, immunotherapy.

dengue.info: Dengue is a viral infection spread by Aedes mosquitoes. Symptoms: fever, rash, pain. Prevention: mosquito control, nets. Remedies: rest, fluids, paracetamol (avoid aspirin).
